Hallo David,
it's the GRI 3.0 mechanism as stated by the line:
gas =3D GRI3=
0('Mix') in the py-script, which fetches the mechanism from
gri30.cti in th=
e data/inputs directory of the cantera installation
tree. The original gri3=
0.inp with the 1st line "! GRI-Mech Version 3.0
3/12/99  CHEMKIN-II format"=
 is located at the same place. Nice, that
cantera is no black box software,=
 the "Defining Phases and Interfaces"
pdf-document by Prof. Goodwin may ser=
ve as a good
starting/accompanying text for use with cantera.

Best regards=


Holger
